headline: Jacobs Recognized by The Dow Jones Sustainability World Index and North America Index
summary: Jacobs (NYSE: J) has earned a place in the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index 2024 for the third year in a row and secured a spot in the North America Index for the fifth consecutive year. Additionally, Jacobs received a Gold Medal from EcoVadis, an AA in MSCI ESG Ratings, while also maintaining its ISS ESG Corporate Rating Prime Status and Sustainalytics medium risk rating. In its latest Market Assessment, Environment Analyst ranks Jacobs No. 2 Environmental & Sustainability Consultancy Globa
